brownnoise:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssidspfilters"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor block="0.02" create="WavReader" path="brownnoise.wav" scale="true">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
bvp:
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssibiosig"/>
<sensor blockInSamples="1" create="FileReader" path="bvp">
	
		
	<output channel="file" pin="bvp"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_merge:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" sr="100.0">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
noisegate:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssilibsoxfilter"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<sensor block="0.02" create="WavReader" path="../build/test/testfiles/79_nlb-20dB.wav">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
compand:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssilibsoxfilter"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<sensor block="0.02" create="WavReader" path="../build/test/testfiles/79_nlb-20dB.wav">

eyesig:
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssieyesig"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" scale="false">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
generic_serial_video:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<load name="ssiffmpeg"/>
<load name="ssigeneric_serial"/>
<sensor baud="115200" create="GenericSerial" dim="4" port="17" separator=";" sr="4">
			
		
	<output channel="serialrawdata" pin="pin_serial_raw_data" size="10.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="Camera" flip="true" fps="5.0" option="camera">
	
		
	<output channel="video" pin="camera" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
chebyshevI:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssidspfilters"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor block="0.02" create="Audio" option="audio" scale="true">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
websocket_mouse_floats:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssiwebsocket"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" mask="1">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="pin_cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
skeleton:
<load name="ssimicrosoftkinect2"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssiskeleton"/>
<sensor create="MicrosoftKinect2" showBodyTracking="true" showFaceTracking="true" sr="15.0" trackNearestPersons="6">
	
		
	<output channel="skeleton" pin="skel"/>
	
	
</sensor>
opennikinect:
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiopennikinect"/>
<sensor create="OpenNIKinect" project="False">
	
		
	<output channel="rgb" pin="rgb"/>
	
		
	<output channel="scene" pin="scene"/>
	
		
	<output channel="depth" pin="depth"/>
	
		
	<output channel="skeleton" pin="skeleton"/>
	
	
</sensor>
event_to_stream:
<load name="ssiframe"/>
<load name="ssievent"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssibiosig"/>
<sensor create="FileReader" loop="False" path="event_to_stream">
	
		
	<output channel="file" pin="bvp" sync="0" watch="0"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="EventToStream" eventValue="number_of_events" useWindow="True">
	
		
	<listen address="@bvp_tuple"/>
	
		
	<output channel="event output" pin="event"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="EventToStream" eventValue="amplitude" useWindow="False">
	
		
	<listen address="@bvp_tuple"/>
	
		
	<output channel="event output" pin="event_amp"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="EventToStream" eventValue="2" useWindow="False">
	
		
	<listen address="@bvp_tuple"/>
	
		
	<output channel="event output" pin="event_amp2"/>
	
	
</sensor>
websocket_mouse_stream:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssiwebsocket"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" event="true" mask="1">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="pin_cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_integral:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" sr="100.0">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>

<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" sr="100.0">

brownnoise_stop:

<load name="ssilibsoxfilter"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<sensor block="0.02" create="WavReader" path="brownnoise.wav" scale="true">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
smile:
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssimodel"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssimicrosoftkinect"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<sensor create="MicrosoftKinect" nearTrackingMode="true" seatedSkeletonMode="false" showBodyTracking="false" showFaceTracking="false" simpleFaceTracking="false" trackNearestPerson="true">
	
		
	<output channel="rgb" pin="rgb"/>
	
		
	<output channel="au" pin="au"/>
	
		
	<output channel="skeleton" pin="skel"/>
	
		
	<output channel="face" pin="face"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_cast:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" sr="100.0">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
gsr_response_event:
<load name="ssiframe"/>
<load name="ssievent"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiehealth"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssibiosig"/>
<sensor create="FileReader" loop="False" path="gsr_lowpass">
	
		
	<output channel="file" pin="gsr" sync="0" watch="0"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="GSREventListener" sr="1" statisticalFunction="0" window="0">
	
		
	<output channel="rising time" pin="rising_time"/>
	
		
	<output channel="power" pin="pow"/>
	
		
	<output channel="numer of responses" pin="nr_resp"/>
	
		
	<output channel="energy" pin="energy"/>
	
		
	<output channel="amplitude" pin="amp"/>
	
		
	<listen address="@gsr_tuple"/>
		
		
	
</sensor>
noisereduction:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssilibsoxfilter"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<sensor block="0.02" create="WavReader" path="../build/test/testfiles/79_nlb-20dB.wav">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
fubi:
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssimicrosoftkinect"/>
<load name="ssiskeleton"/>
<load name="ssifubi"/>
<sensor create="MicrosoftKinect" nearTrackingMode="true" seatedSkeletonMode="false" showBodyTracking="true" showFaceTracking="true" simpleFaceTracking="true" trackNearestPerson="true">
	
		
	<output channel="rgb" pin="rgb"/>
			
		
	<output channel="head" pin="head"/>
			
		
	<output channel="face3d" pin="face3d"/>
			
		
	<output channel="skeleton" pin="skel"/>
			
	
</sensor>
sensingtex:
<load name="ssisensingtex"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor cols="8" create="SensingTex" port="11" rows="8" scale="true" sr="20.0">
	
		
	<output channel="pressurematrix" pin="press_raw"/>
	
	
</sensor>
socket_udp_reader:
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="SocketReader" format="0" port="7777" sbyte="4" sdim="2" ssr="50.0" stype="9" type="0">
			
		
	<output channel="socket" pin="cursor1"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="SocketReader" delim=";" format="1" port="8888" sbyte="4" sdim="2" ssr="50.0" stype="9" type="0">
			
		
	<output channel="socket" pin="cursor2"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="SocketReader" format="2" port="9999" sbyte="4" sdim="2" ssr="50.0" stype="9" type="0">
			
		
	<output channel="socket" pin="cursor3"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_selector:
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<sensor create="Mouse" sr="100.0">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor"/>
	
	
</sensor>
microsoftkinect2:
<load name="microsoftkinect2"/>
<load name="graphic"/>
<load name="ioput"/>
<sensor create="MicrosoftKinect2" showBodyTracking="true" showFaceTracking="true" sr="15.0" trackNearestPersons="6">
	
		
	<output channel="rgb" pin="rgb"/>
	
		
	<output channel="depth" pin="depth"/>
	
		
	<output channel="ir" pin="ir"/>
	
		
	<output channel="au" pin="au"/>
	
		
	<output channel="head" pin="head"/>
	
		
	<output channel="skeleton" pin="skel"/>
	
		
	<output channel="face" pin="face"/>
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>
signal_multiply:
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssimouse"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssicontrol"/>
<sensor create="Mouse">
	
		
	<output channel="cursor" pin="cursor">
		
			
		<transformer create="Selector" indices="0,1"/>
		
		
	</output>
	
	
</sensor>
ffmpeg_stream_client:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssiffmpeg"/>
<sensor create="FFMPEGReader" fps="25.0" height="240" stream="true" url="udp://127.0.0.1:2222" width="320">
			
		
	<output channel="video" pin="video" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor asr="48000.0" create="FFMPEGReader" stream="true" url="udp://127.0.0.1:3333">
			
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
ffmpeg_file:
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssiffmpeg"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>
<load name="ssiaudio"/>
<sensor channel="3" create="Camera" depth="8" flip="true" fps="25.0" height="480" option="camera" width="640">
	
		
	<output channel="video" pin="video" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="Audio" option="audio" scale="true">
	
		
	<output channel="audio" pin="audio" size="2.0s"/>
	
	
</sensor>

</sensor>

	<output channel="audio" pin="audio"/>
	
	
</sensor>

<load name="ssimodel"/>
<load name="ssisignal"/>
<load name="ssimicrosoftkinect"/>
<load name="ssicamera"/>

	<output channel="au" pin="au"/>

</sensor>

bvp_beat_event:
<load name="ssiframe"/>
<load name="ssievent"/>
<load name="ssigraphic"/>
<load name="ssiehealth"/>
<load name="ssiioput"/>
<load name="ssibiosig"/>
<sensor create="FileReader" loop="False" path="..\..\..\..\..\hertwig_obermayer\Stress_Test_Sessions\30.0-.2-15_15-37-12(Stephan)\bvp">
	
		
	<output channel="file" pin="bvp" sync="0" watch="0"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="BVPEventRawListener" sr="9">
	
		
	<output channel="interbeat interval" pin="ib_raw"/>
	
		
	<output channel="heart rate" pin="hr_raw"/>
	
		
	<output channel="amplitude" pin="amp_raw"/>
	
		
	<listen address="@bvp_tuple"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="BVPEventStatisticalListener" sr="1" statisticalFunction="1" window="60000">
	
		
	<output channel="interbeat interval" pin="ib_sum"/>
	
		
	<output channel="heart rate" pin="hr_sum"/>
	
		
	<output channel="amplitude" pin="amp_sum"/>
	
		
	<listen address="@bvp_tuple"/>
	
	
</sensor>
<sensor create="BVPEventRMSSDListener" window="10000">
	
		
	<output channel="RMSSD" pin="rmssd"/>
	
		
	<listen address="@bvp_tuple"/>
	
	
</sensor>
